plot: The misadventures of a traveling theatrical company, as the actors attempt to put on a show while romantic rivalries erupt backstage.
title: Amour noir et amour blanc
plot_es: The misadventures of a traveling theatrical company, as the actors attempt to put on a show while romantic rivalries erupt backstage.
plot_en: The misadventures of a traveling theatrical company, as the actors attempt to put on a show while romantic rivalries erupt backstage.
